thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location
thread.title_full: Great Location - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Arsoncatcher
title: Great Location
text: The hotel is one block off time square. The view from the room was niece. The room was ample size and was found clean. The noise was never an issue during our stay. The house keeping personnel were polite, professional and did a great job. The morning free Starbucks coffee and news paper was a great perk. The hotel is a block from the metro and many restaurants were in the area. A Catholic Church is across the street as well as the Broadway show Chicago.
